predicate.note: Example frames file for 'verb' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Just a rough template for creating your frameset. The numbers may not refer to actual classes as they are just examples.

roleset.name: verb, action

example.name: just thing done
example.text: Situation will become so tight that it won't matter what action a doer verbs *trace* -- circumstances will prevent him from gaining any benefit.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Health and Human Services Secretary Louis Sullivan has done what was expected of him, Bush administration officials said.

roleset.note: Refer to 'perform' for usage of higher #'d args, if they appear.
